title: The X-Files (TV series): Did Mulder and Scully ever have sex?

og.title: The X-Files (TV series): Did Mulder and Scully ever have sex?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 9): In the episode "Per Manum," flashbacks reveal that Scully decides to get in vitro fertilization, and that she asks Mulder to be the father. The first attempt fails, but they "keep trying." 

In the trailer for the episode "All Things," Scully is seen getting ready in Mulder's bat...
